targets.expr:
count by (service_type) (sum by (service_name,service_type) (max_over_time(mysql_global_status_threads_connected{service_name=~"$service_name"}[$interval]) or 
sum by (service_name,service_type) (max_over_time(mongodb_connections{service_name=~"$service_name",state="current"}[$interval])) or
sum by (service_name,service_type) (max_over_time(pg_stat_database_numbackends{service_name=~"$service_name"}[$interval]))))

max(clamp_max(sum by (node_name) ((clamp_max(rate(node_cpu_seconds_total{node_name=~"$node_name",region=~"$region",node_type=~"$node_type",mode!="idle",mode!="iowait",mode!="steal"}[$interval]),1)) or 
(irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{node_name=~"$node_name",region=~"$region",node_type=~"$node_type",mode!="idle",mode!="iowait",mode!="steal"}[5m])) )*100 or 
(avg_over_time(node_cpu_average{node_name=~"$node_name",region=~"$region",node_type=~"$node_type", mode="total"}[$interval]) or 
avg_over_time(node_cpu_average{node_name=~"$node_name",region=~"$region",node_type=~"$node_type", mode="total"}[5m])),100))

max(clamp_max(sum by (node_name) ((clamp_max(rate(node_cpu_seconds_total{node_name=~"$node_name",region=~"$region",node_type=~"$node_type",mode="steal"}[$interval]),1)) or 
(irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{node_name=~"$node_name",region=~"$region",node_type=~"$node_type",mode="steal"}[5m])) )*100 or 
(avg_over_time(node_cpu_average{node_name=~"$node_name",region=~"$region",node_type=~"$node_type", mode="steal"}[$interval]) or 
avg_over_time(node_cpu_average{node_name=~"$node_name",region=~"$region",node_type=~"$node_type", mode="steal"}[5m])),100))

max(clamp_max(sum by (node_name) ((clamp_max(rate(node_cpu_seconds_total{node_name=~"$node_name",region=~"$region",node_type=~"$node_type",mode="iowait"}[$interval]),1)) or 
(irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{node_name=~"$node_name",region=~"$region",node_type=~"$node_type",mode="iowait"}[5m])))*100 or 
(avg_over_time(node_cpu_average{node_name=~"$node_name",region=~"$region",node_type=~"$node_type", mode="iowait"}[$interval]) or 
avg_over_time(node_cpu_average{node_name=~"$node_name",region=~"$region",node_type=~"$node_type", mode="iowait"}[5m])) or max_over_time(rdsosmetrics_cpuUtilization_wait{node_name=~"$node_name"}[$interval]) or max_over_time(rdsosmetrics_cpuUtilization_wait{node_name=~"$node_name"}[5m]),100))

max(max by (node_name)((avg_over_time(node_procs_running{node_name=~"$node_name"}[$interval])-1) / 
scalar(count(node_cpu_seconds_total{mode="user", node_name=~"$node_name"})) or 
(avg_over_time(node_procs_running{node_name=~"$node_name"}[5m])-1) / 
scalar(count(node_cpu_seconds_total{mode="user", node_name=~"$node_name"})) or 
(max_over_time(aws_rds_cpu_credit_usage_average{node_name=~"$node_name"}[$interval]) or 
max_over_time(aws_rds_cpu_credit_usage_average{node_name=~"$node_name"}[5m]))))

panels.description: The CPU time is measured in clock ticks or seconds. It is useful to measure CPU time as a percentage of the CPU's capacity, which is called the CPU usage.

targets.expr:
topk(5,avg by (node_name) (sum by (node_name) ( avg by (mode,node_name) ((clamp_max(rate(node_cpu_seconds_total{node_name=~"$node_name",region=~"$region",
node_type=~"$node_type",mode!="idle",mode!="steal",mode!="iowait"}[$interval]),1)) or 
(clamp_max(irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{node_name=~"$node_name",region=~"$region",node_type=~"$node_type",mode!="idle",mode!="steal",mode!="iowait"}[5m]),1)) ) )*100 or 
(avg_over_time(node_cpu_average{node_name=~"$node_name",region=~"$region",node_type=~"$node_type", mode="total"}[$interval]) or 
avg_over_time(node_cpu_average{node_name=~"$node_name",region=~"$region",node_type=~"$node_type", mode="total"}[5m]))))

avg by () (sum by (node_name) ( avg by (mode,node_name) ((clamp_max(rate(node_cpu_seconds_total{node_name=~"$node_name",region=~"$region",
node_type=~"$node_type",mode!="idle",mode!="steal",mode!="iowait"}[$interval]),1)) or 
(clamp_max(irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{node_name=~"$node_name",region=~"$region",node_type=~"$node_type",mode!="idle",mode!="steal",mode!="iowait"}[5m]),1)) ) )*100 or 
(avg_over_time(node_cpu_average{node_name=~"$node_name",region=~"$region",node_type=~"$node_type", mode="total"}[$interval]) or 
avg_over_time(node_cpu_average{node_name=~"$node_name",region=~"$region",node_type=~"$node_type", mode="total"}[5m])))

panels.title: Top 5 CPU Usage

targets.expr:
avg by (node_name) (clamp_max(sum by (node_name) ((clamp_max(rate(node_cpu_seconds_total{node_name=~"$node_name",region=~"$region",node_type=~"$node_type",mode!="idle",mode!="iowait",mode!="steal"}[$interval]),1)) or 
(irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{node_name=~"$node_name",region=~"$region",node_type=~"$node_type",mode!="idle",mode!="iowait",mode!="steal"}[5m])) )*100 or 
(avg_over_time(node_cpu_average{node_name=~"$node_name",region=~"$region",node_type=~"$node_type", mode="total"}[$interval]) or 
avg_over_time(node_cpu_average{node_name=~"$node_name",region=~"$region",node_type=~"$node_type", mode="total"}[5m])),100))

topk(5,avg by (node_name) (sum by (node_name) ( avg by (mode,node_name) ((clamp_max(rate(node_cpu_seconds_total{node_name=~"$node_name",region=~"$region",
node_type=~"$node_type",mode="steal"}[$interval]),1)) or 
(clamp_max(irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{node_name=~"$node_name",region=~"$region",node_type=~"$node_type",mode="steal"}[5m]),1)) ) )*100 or 
(avg_over_time(node_cpu_average{node_name=~"$node_name",region=~"$region",node_type=~"$node_type", mode="steal"}[$interval]) or 
avg_over_time(node_cpu_average{node_name=~"$node_name",region=~"$region",node_type=~"$node_type", mode="steal"}[5m]))))

avg by () (sum by (node_name) ( avg by (mode,node_name) ((clamp_max(rate(node_cpu_seconds_total{node_name=~"$node_name",region=~"$region",
node_type=~"$node_type",mode="steal"}[$interval]),1)) or 
(clamp_max(irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{node_name=~"$node_name",region=~"$region",node_type=~"$node_type",mode="steal"}[5m]),1)) ) )*100 or 
(avg_over_time(node_cpu_average{node_name=~"$node_name",region=~"$region",node_type=~"$node_type", mode="steal"}[$interval]) or 
avg_over_time(node_cpu_average{node_name=~"$node_name",region=~"$region",node_type=~"$node_type", mode="steal"}[5m])))

avg by (node_name) (clamp_max(sum by (node_name) ((clamp_max(rate(node_cpu_seconds_total{node_name=~"$node_name",region=~"$region",node_type=~"$node_type",mode="steal"}[$interval]),1)) or 
(irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{node_name=~"$node_name",region=~"$region",node_type=~"$node_type",mode="steal"}[5m])) )*100 or 
(avg_over_time(node_cpu_average{node_name=~"$node_name",region=~"$region",node_type=~"$node_type", mode="steal"}[$interval]) or 
avg_over_time(node_cpu_average{node_name=~"$node_name",region=~"$region",node_type=~"$node_type", mode="steal"}[5m])),100))

topk(5,avg by (node_name) (sum by (node_name) ( avg by (mode,node_name) ((clamp_max(rate(node_cpu_seconds_total{node_name=~"$node_name",region=~"$region",
node_type=~"$node_type",mode="iowait"}[$interval]),1)) or 
(clamp_max(irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{node_name=~"$node_name",region=~"$region",node_type=~"$node_type",mode="iowait"}[5m]),1)) ) )*100 or 
(avg_over_time(node_cpu_average{node_name=~"$node_name",region=~"$region",node_type=~"$node_type", mode="iowait"}[$interval]) or 
avg_over_time(node_cpu_average{node_name=~"$node_name",region=~"$region",node_type=~"$node_type", mode="iowait"}[5m])) or 
max_over_time(rdsosmetrics_cpuUtilization_wait{node_name=~"$node_name"}[$interval]) or max_over_time(rdsosmetrics_cpuUtilization_wait{node_name=~"$node_name"}[5m])))

avg((sum by (node_name) ( avg by (mode,node_name) ((clamp_max(rate(node_cpu_seconds_total{node_name=~"$node_name",region=~"$region",
node_type=~"$node_type",mode="iowait"}[$interval]),1)) or 
(clamp_max(irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{node_name=~"$node_name",region=~"$region",node_type=~"$node_type",mode="iowait"}[5m]),1)) ) )*100 or 
(avg_over_time(node_cpu_average{node_name=~"$node_name",region=~"$region",node_type=~"$node_type", mode="iowait"}[$interval]) or 
avg_over_time(node_cpu_average{node_name=~"$node_name",region=~"$region",node_type=~"$node_type", mode="iowait"}[5m])) or 
max_over_time(rdsosmetrics_cpuUtilization_wait{node_name=~"$node_name"}[$interval]) or max_over_time(rdsosmetrics_cpuUtilization_wait{node_name=~"$node_name"}[5m])))

avg by (node_name) ((sum by (node_name) ( avg by (mode,node_name) ((clamp_max(rate(node_cpu_seconds_total{node_name=~"$node_name",region=~"$region",
node_type=~"$node_type",mode="iowait"}[$interval]),1)) or 
(clamp_max(irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{node_name=~"$node_name",region=~"$region",node_type=~"$node_type",mode="iowait"}[5m]),1)) ) )*100 or 
(avg_over_time(node_cpu_average{node_name=~"$node_name",region=~"$region",node_type=~"$node_type", mode="iowait"}[$interval]) or 
avg_over_time(node_cpu_average{node_name=~"$node_name",region=~"$region",node_type=~"$node_type", mode="iowait"}[5m])) or 
max_over_time(rdsosmetrics_cpuUtilization_wait{node_name=~"$node_name"}[$interval]) or max_over_time(rdsosmetrics_cpuUtilization_wait{node_name=~"$node_name"}[5m])))

panels.description: When a system is running with maximum CPU utilization, the transmitting and receiving threads must all share the available CPU. This will cause data to be queued more frequently to cope with the lack of CPU. CPU Saturation may be measured as the length of a wait queue, or the time spent waiting on the queue.

targets.expr:
topk(5,max by (node_name)((avg_over_time(node_procs_running{node_name=~"$node_name"}[$interval])-1) / 
scalar(count(node_cpu_seconds_total{mode="user", node_name=~"$node_name"})) or 
(avg_over_time(node_procs_running{node_name=~"$node_name"}[5m])-1) / 
scalar(count(node_cpu_seconds_total{mode="user", node_name=~"$node_name"})) or 
(max_over_time(aws_rds_cpu_credit_usage_average{node_name=~"$node_name"}[$interval]) or 
max_over_time(aws_rds_cpu_credit_usage_average{node_name=~"$node_name"}[5m]))))

avg(max by (node_name)((avg_over_time(node_procs_running{node_name=~"$node_name"}[$interval])-1) / 
scalar(count(node_cpu_seconds_total{mode="user", node_name=~"$node_name"})) or 
(avg_over_time(node_procs_running{node_name=~"$node_name"}[5m])-1) / 
scalar(count(node_cpu_seconds_total{mode="user", node_name=~"$node_name"})) or 
(max_over_time(aws_rds_cpu_credit_usage_average{node_name=~"$node_name"}[$interval]) or 
max_over_time(aws_rds_cpu_credit_usage_average{node_name=~"$node_name"}[5m]))))

panels.title: Top 5 CPU Saturation

targets.expr:
max by (node_name) ((avg_over_time(node_procs_running{node_name=~"$node_name"}[$interval])-1) / 
scalar(count(node_cpu_seconds_total{mode="user", node_name=~"$node_name"})) or 
(avg_over_time(node_procs_running{node_name=~"$node_name"}[5m])-1) / 
scalar(count(node_cpu_seconds_total{mode="user", node_name=~"$node_name"})) or 
(max_over_time(aws_rds_cpu_credit_usage_average{node_name=~"$node_name"}[$interval]) or 
max_over_time(aws_rds_cpu_credit_usage_average{node_name=~"$node_name"}[5m])))

max(sum by (node_name) (rate(node_disk_read_time_seconds_total{node_name=~"$node_name"}[$interval]) or 
irate(node_disk_read_time_seconds_total{node_name=~"$node_name"}[5m])) + 
sum by (node_name) (rate(node_disk_write_time_seconds_total{node_name=~"$node_name"}[$interval]) or 
irate(node_disk_write_time_seconds_total{node_name=~"$node_name"}[5m])) or 
sum by (node_name) ((max_over_time(rdsosmetrics_diskIO_readIOsPS{node_name=~"$node_name"}[$interval]) or max_over_time(rdsosmetrics_diskIO_readIOsPS{node_name=~"$node_name"}[5m])) +
(max_over_time(rdsosmetrics_diskIO_writeIOsPS{node_name=~"$node_name"}[$interval]) or max_over_time(rdsosmetrics_diskIO_writeIOsPS{node_name=~"$node_name"}[5m]))))

max(sum by (node_name) ((rate(node_disk_write_time_seconds_total{node_name=~"$node_name"}[$interval]) / 
rate(node_disk_writes_completed_total{node_name=~"$node_name"}[$interval])) > 0  or 
(irate(node_disk_write_time_seconds_total{node_name=~"$node_name"}[5m]) /
irate(node_disk_writes_completed_total{node_name=~"$node_name"}[5m])) > bool 0) +
sum by (node_name) ((rate(node_disk_read_time_seconds_total{node_name=~"$node_name"}[$interval]) / 
rate(node_disk_reads_completed_total{node_name=~"$node_name"}[$interval])) > 0 or 
(irate(node_disk_read_time_seconds_total{node_name=~"$node_name"}[5m]) /
irate(node_disk_reads_completed_total{node_name=~"$node_name"}[5m])) > bool 0) or
((avg_over_time(aws_rds_write_latency_average{node_name=~"$node_name"}[$interval])/1000 or 
avg_over_time(aws_rds_write_latency_average{node_name=~"$node_name"}[5m])/1000) + 
(avg_over_time(aws_rds_read_latency_average{node_name=~"$node_name"}[$interval])/1000 or 
avg_over_time(aws_rds_read_latency_average{node_name=~"$node_name"}[5m])/1000)))

max((rate(node_disk_reads_completed_total{node_name=~"$node_name"}[$interval]) or
irate(node_disk_reads_completed_total{node_name=~"$node_name"}[5m])) or
(max_over_time(rdsosmetrics_diskIO_readIOsPS{node_name=~"$node_name"}[$interval]) or
max_over_time(rdsosmetrics_diskIO_readIOsPS{node_name=~"$node_name"}[5m]))+
(rate(node_disk_writes_completed_total{node_name=~"$node_name"}[$interval]) or
irate(node_disk_writes_completed_total{node_name=~"$node_name"}[5m])) or
(max_over_time(rdsosmetrics_diskIO_writeIOsPS{node_name=~"$node_name"}[$interval]) or
max_over_time(rdsosmetrics_diskIO_writeIOsPS{node_name=~"$node_name"}[5m])))

max((sum by (node_name) ((rate(node_disk_read_bytes_total{node_name=~"$node_name"}[$interval]) or 
irate(node_disk_read_bytes_total{node_name=~"$node_name"}[5m])) or
(rate(rdsosmetrics_diskIO_readThroughput{node_name=~"$node_name"}[$interval]) or
irate(rdsosmetrics_diskIO_readThroughput{node_name=~"$node_name"}[5m])) +
rate(node_disk_written_bytes_total{node_name=~"$node_name"}[$interval]) or 
irate(node_disk_written_bytes_total{node_name=~"$node_name"}[5m]) or
(rate(rdsosmetrics_diskIO_writeThroughput{node_name=~"$node_name"}[$interval]) or
irate(rdsosmetrics_diskIO_writeThroughput{node_name=~"$node_name"}[5m])))
))

panels.description: Shows how much disk was loaded for reads or writes as average number of outstanding requests at different period of time.  High disk load is a good measure of actual storage utilization. Different storage types handle load differently - some will show latency increases on low loads others can handle higher load with no problems.

targets.expr:
topk(5,
(sum by (node_name) (rate(node_disk_read_time_seconds_total{node_name=~"$node_name"}[$interval]) or 
irate(node_disk_read_time_seconds_total{node_name=~"$node_name"}[5m]))) + 
(sum by (node_name) (rate(node_disk_write_time_seconds_total{node_name=~"$node_name"}[$interval]) or 
irate(node_disk_write_time_seconds_total{node_name=~"$node_name"}[5m]))) or
sum by (node_name) ((max_over_time(rdsosmetrics_diskIO_readIOsPS{node_name=~"$node_name"}[$interval]) or max_over_time(rdsosmetrics_diskIO_readIOsPS{node_name=~"$node_name"}[5m])) +
(max_over_time(rdsosmetrics_diskIO_writeIOsPS{node_name=~"$node_name"}[$interval]) or max_over_time(rdsosmetrics_diskIO_writeIOsPS{node_name=~"$node_name"}[5m])))
)

avg((sum by (node_name) (rate(node_disk_read_time_seconds_total{node_name=~"$node_name"}[$interval]) or 
irate(node_disk_read_time_seconds_total{node_name=~"$node_name"}[5m]))) + 
(sum by (node_name) (rate(node_disk_write_time_seconds_total{node_name=~"$node_name"}[$interval]) or 
irate(node_disk_write_time_seconds_total{node_name=~"$node_name"}[5m]))) or
sum by (node_name) ((max_over_time(rdsosmetrics_diskIO_readIOsPS{node_name=~"$node_name"}[$interval]) or max_over_time(rdsosmetrics_diskIO_readIOsPS{node_name=~"$node_name"}[5m])) +
(max_over_time(rdsosmetrics_diskIO_writeIOsPS{node_name=~"$node_name"}[$interval]) or max_over_time(rdsosmetrics_diskIO_writeIOsPS{node_name=~"$node_name"}[5m]))))

panels.title: Top 5 Disk I/O Load

targets.expr:
(sum by (node_name) (rate(node_disk_read_time_seconds_total{node_name=~"$node_name"}[$interval]) or 
irate(node_disk_read_time_seconds_total{node_name=~"$node_name"}[5m]))) + 
(sum by (node_name) (rate(node_disk_write_time_seconds_total{node_name=~"$node_name"}[$interval]) or 
irate(node_disk_write_time_seconds_total{node_name=~"$node_name"}[5m]))) or
sum by (node_name) ((max_over_time(rdsosmetrics_diskIO_readIOsPS{node_name=~"$node_name"}[$interval]) or max_over_time(rdsosmetrics_diskIO_readIOsPS{node_name=~"$node_name"}[5m])) +
(max_over_time(rdsosmetrics_diskIO_writeIOsPS{node_name=~"$node_name"}[$interval]) or max_over_time(rdsosmetrics_diskIO_writeIOsPS{node_name=~"$node_name"}[5m])))

panels.description: Shows average latency for Reads and Writes IO Devices.  Higher than typical latency for highly loaded storage indicates saturation (overload) and is frequent cause of performance problems.  Higher than normal latency also can indicate internal storage problems.

targets.expr:
topk(5,(
avg by (node_name) (sum by (node_name) ((rate(node_disk_write_time_seconds_total{node_name=~"$node_name"}[$interval]) / 
rate(node_disk_writes_completed_total{node_name=~"$node_name"}[$interval])) > 0  or 
(irate(node_disk_write_time_seconds_total{node_name=~"$node_name"}[5m]) /
irate(node_disk_writes_completed_total{node_name=~"$node_name"}[5m])) > bool 0) +
sum by (node_name) ((rate(node_disk_read_time_seconds_total{node_name=~"$node_name"}[$interval]) / 
rate(node_disk_reads_completed_total{node_name=~"$node_name"}[$interval])) > 0 or 
(irate(node_disk_read_time_seconds_total{node_name=~"$node_name"}[5m]) /
irate(node_disk_reads_completed_total{node_name=~"$node_name"}[5m])) > bool 0) or
((avg_over_time(aws_rds_write_latency_average{node_name=~"$node_name"}[$interval])/1000 or 
avg_over_time(aws_rds_write_latency_average{node_name=~"$node_name"}[5m])/1000) + 
(avg_over_time(aws_rds_read_latency_average{node_name=~"$node_name"}[$interval])/1000 or 
avg_over_time(aws_rds_read_latency_average{node_name=~"$node_name"}[5m])/1000)) or
max_over_time(rdsosmetrics_diskIO_readLatency{node_name=~"$node_name"}[$interval]) or 
max_over_time(rdsosmetrics_diskIO_readLatency{node_name=~"$node_name"}[5m]) + 
max_over_time(rdsosmetrics_diskIO_writeLatency{node_name=~"$node_name"}[$interval]) or 
max_over_time(rdsosmetrics_diskIO_writeLatency{node_name=~"$node_name"}[5m]))))

avg(
sum by (node_name) ((rate(node_disk_write_time_seconds_total{node_name=~"$node_name"}[$interval]) / 
rate(node_disk_writes_completed_total{node_name=~"$node_name"}[$interval])) > 0  or 
(irate(node_disk_write_time_seconds_total{node_name=~"$node_name"}[5m]) /
irate(node_disk_writes_completed_total{node_name=~"$node_name"}[5m])) > bool 0) +
sum by (node_name) ((rate(node_disk_read_time_seconds_total{node_name=~"$node_name"}[$interval]) / 
rate(node_disk_reads_completed_total{node_name=~"$node_name"}[$interval])) > 0 or 
(irate(node_disk_read_time_seconds_total{node_name=~"$node_name"}[5m]) /
irate(node_disk_reads_completed_total{node_name=~"$node_name"}[5m])) > bool 0) or
((avg_over_time(aws_rds_write_latency_average{node_name=~"$node_name"}[$interval])/1000 or 
avg_over_time(aws_rds_write_latency_average{node_name=~"$node_name"}[5m])/1000) + 
(avg_over_time(aws_rds_read_latency_average{node_name=~"$node_name"}[$interval])/1000 or 
avg_over_time(aws_rds_read_latency_average{node_name=~"$node_name"}[5m])/1000)) or
max_over_time(rdsosmetrics_diskIO_readLatency{node_name=~"$node_name"}[$interval]) or 
max_over_time(rdsosmetrics_diskIO_readLatency{node_name=~"$node_name"}[5m]) + 
max_over_time(rdsosmetrics_diskIO_writeLatency{node_name=~"$node_name"}[$interval]) or 
max_over_time(rdsosmetrics_diskIO_writeLatency{node_name=~"$node_name"}[5m]))

panels.title: Top 5 Disk Latency

targets.expr:
avg by (node_name) ((sum by (node_name) ((rate(node_disk_write_time_seconds_total{node_name=~"$node_name"}[$interval]) / 
rate(node_disk_writes_completed_total{node_name=~"$node_name"}[$interval])) > 0  or 
(rate(node_disk_write_time_seconds_total{node_name=~"$node_name"}[$interval]) /
rate(node_disk_writes_completed_total{node_name=~"$node_name"}[$interval])) > bool 0) +
sum by (node_name) ((rate(node_disk_read_time_seconds_total{node_name=~"$node_name"}[$interval]) / 
rate(node_disk_reads_completed_total{node_name=~"$node_name"}[$interval])) > 0 or 
(rate(node_disk_read_time_seconds_total{node_name=~"$node_name"}[$interval]) /
rate(node_disk_reads_completed_total{node_name=~"$node_name"}[$interval])) > bool 0) or
((avg_over_time(aws_rds_write_latency_average{node_name=~"$node_name"}[$interval])/1000 or 
avg_over_time(aws_rds_write_latency_average{node_name=~"$node_name"}[5m])/1000) + 
(avg_over_time(aws_rds_read_latency_average{node_name=~"$node_name"}[$interval])/1000 or 
avg_over_time(aws_rds_read_latency_average{node_name=~"$node_name"}[5m])/1000)) or
max_over_time(rdsosmetrics_diskIO_readLatency{node_name=~"$node_name"}[$interval]) or 
max_over_time(rdsosmetrics_diskIO_readLatency{node_name=~"$node_name"}[5m]) + 
max_over_time(rdsosmetrics_diskIO_writeLatency{node_name=~"$node_name"}[$interval]) or 
max_over_time(rdsosmetrics_diskIO_writeLatency{node_name=~"$node_name"}[5m])))

topk(5,(sum by (node_name) ((rate(node_disk_read_bytes_total{node_name=~"$node_name"}[$interval]) or 
irate(node_disk_read_bytes_total{node_name=~"$node_name"}[5m])) or
(rate(rdsosmetrics_diskIO_readThroughput{node_name=~"$node_name"}[$interval]) or
irate(rdsosmetrics_diskIO_readThroughput{node_name=~"$node_name"}[5m])) +
rate(node_disk_written_bytes_total{node_name=~"$node_name"}[$interval]) or 
irate(node_disk_written_bytes_total{node_name=~"$node_name"}[5m]) or
(rate(rdsosmetrics_diskIO_writeThroughput{node_name=~"$node_name"}[$interval]) or
irate(rdsosmetrics_diskIO_writeThroughput{node_name=~"$node_name"}[5m])))
))

avg by() (sum by (node_name) ((rate(node_disk_read_bytes_total{node_name=~"$node_name"}[$interval]) or 
irate(node_disk_read_bytes_total{node_name=~"$node_name"}[5m])) or
(rate(rdsosmetrics_diskIO_readThroughput{node_name=~"$node_name"}[$interval]) or
irate(rdsosmetrics_diskIO_readThroughput{node_name=~"$node_name"}[5m])) +
rate(node_disk_written_bytes_total{node_name=~"$node_name"}[$interval]) or

(rate(rdsosmetrics_diskIO_writeThroughput{node_name=~"$node_name"}[$interval]) or
irate(rdsosmetrics_diskIO_writeThroughput{node_name=~"$node_name"}[5m])))
)

(sum by (node_name) ((rate(node_disk_read_bytes_total{node_name=~"$node_name"}[$interval]) or 
irate(node_disk_read_bytes_total{node_name=~"$node_name"}[5m])) or

(rate(rdsosmetrics_diskIO_writeThroughput{node_name=~"$node_name"}[$interval]) or
irate(rdsosmetrics_diskIO_writeThroughput{node_name=~"$node_name"}[5m])))
)

topk(5,avg by (node_name)((rate(node_vmstat_pgpgin{node_name=~"$node_name"}[$interval]) * 1024 or irate(node_vmstat_pgpgin{node_name=~"$node_name"}[5m]) * 1024 ) + (rate(node_vmstat_pgpgout{node_name=~"$node_name"}[$interval]) * 1024 or irate(node_vmstat_pgpgout{node_name=~"$node_name"}[5m]) * 1024)) or 
sum by (node_name) (max_over_time(rdsosmetrics_diskIO_readKbPS{node_name=~"$node_name"}[$interval]) or max_over_time(rdsosmetrics_diskIO_readKbPS{node_name=~"$node_name"}[5m]) + max_over_time(rdsosmetrics_diskIO_writeKbPS{node_name=~"$node_name"}[$interval]) or max_over_time(rdsosmetrics_diskIO_writeKbPS{node_name=~"$node_name"}[5m])))

avg(((rate(node_vmstat_pgpgin{node_name=~"$node_name"}[$interval]) * 1024 or irate(node_vmstat_pgpgin{node_name=~"$node_name"}[5m]) * 1024 ) + (rate(node_vmstat_pgpgout{node_name=~"$node_name"}[$interval]) * 1024 or irate(node_vmstat_pgpgout{node_name=~"$node_name"}[5m]) * 1024)) or 
sum by (node_name) (max_over_time(rdsosmetrics_diskIO_readKbPS{node_name=~"$node_name"}[$interval]) or max_over_time(rdsosmetrics_diskIO_readKbPS{node_name=~"$node_name"}[5m]) + max_over_time(rdsosmetrics_diskIO_writeKbPS{node_name=~"$node_name"}[$interval]) or max_over_time(rdsosmetrics_diskIO_writeKbPS{node_name=~"$node_name"}[5m])))

avg by (node_name)((rate(node_vmstat_pgpgin{node_name=~"$node_name"}[$interval]) * 1024 or irate(node_vmstat_pgpgin{node_name=~"$node_name"}[5m]) * 1024 ) + (rate(node_vmstat_pgpgout{node_name=~"$node_name"}[$interval]) * 1024 or irate(node_vmstat_pgpgout{node_name=~"$node_name"}[5m]) * 1024)) or 
sum by (node_name) (max_over_time(rdsosmetrics_diskIO_readKbPS{node_name=~"$node_name"}[$interval]) or max_over_time(rdsosmetrics_diskIO_readKbPS{node_name=~"$node_name"}[5m]) + max_over_time(rdsosmetrics_diskIO_writeKbPS{node_name=~"$node_name"}[$interval]) or max_over_time(rdsosmetrics_diskIO_writeKbPS{node_name=~"$node_name"}[5m]))

max((sum by (node_name) (rate(node_network_receive_bytes_total{node_name=~"$node_name", device!="lo"}[$interval])) or 
sum by (node_name) (irate(node_network_receive_bytes_total{node_name=~"$node_name", device!="lo"}[5m])) or 
sum by (node_name) (max_over_time(rdsosmetrics_network_rx{node_name=~"$node_name"}[$interval])) or 
sum by (node_name) (max_over_time(rdsosmetrics_network_rx{node_name=~"$node_name"}[5m]))))

(sum by (node_name) (rate(node_network_transmit_bytes_total{node_name=~"$node_name", device!="lo"}[$interval])) or

irate(node_network_transmit_drop_total{node_name=~"$node_name", device!="lo"}[5m])))

sum by (node_name) (irate(node_network_receive_bytes_total{node_name=~"$node_name", device!="lo"}[5m])) or

sum by (node_name) (max_over_time(rdsosmetrics_network_rx{node_name=~"$node_name"}[5m])) + 
(sum by (node_name) (rate(node_network_transmit_bytes_total{node_name=~"$node_name", device!="lo"}[$interval])) or 
sum by (node_name) (irate(node_network_transmit_bytes_total{node_name=~"$node_name", device!="lo"}[5m])) or

sum by (node_name) (max_over_time(rdsosmetrics_network_tx{node_name=~"$node_name"}[5m])))
))

avg by() (sum by (node_name) (rate(node_network_receive_bytes_total{node_name=~"$node_name", device!="lo"}[$interval])) or 
sum by (node_name) (irate(node_network_receive_bytes_total{node_name=~"$node_name", device!="lo"}[5m])) or

panels.description: Total Number of Local Network Interface Transmit Errors, Receive Errors and Drops.  Should be  Zero

targets.expr:
topk(5,(sum by (node_name) (rate(node_network_receive_errs_total{node_name=~"$node_name", device!="lo"}[$interval]) + rate(node_network_transmit_errs_total{node_name=~"$node_name", device!="lo"}[$interval])) or 
sum by (node_name) (irate(node_network_receive_errs_total{node_name=~"$node_name", device!="lo"}[5m]) + irate(node_network_transmit_errs_total{node_name=~"$node_name", device!="lo"}[5m]))))

avg by() (sum by (node_name) (rate(node_network_receive_errs_total{node_name=~"$node_name", device!="lo"}[$interval]) + rate(node_network_transmit_errs_total{node_name=~"$node_name", device!="lo"}[$interval])) or 
sum by (node_name) (irate(node_network_receive_errs_total{node_name=~"$node_name", device!="lo"}[5m]) + irate(node_network_transmit_errs_total{node_name=~"$node_name", device!="lo"}[5m])))
